languages.text: "П-прошу меня простить, офицеры разведки только что прислали обновленный отчет: мы перехватили сигнал бедствия с поверхности планеты! Велика вероятность, что передающая его портативная система радиовещания принадлежит пропавшему офицеру! Дозволяете отправить отряд на поиски?"

traits.locale_text: "П-прошу меня простить, офицеры разведки только что прислали обновленный отчет: мы перехватили сигнал бедствия с поверхности планеты! Велика вероятность, что передающая его портативная система радиовещания принадлежит пропавшему офицеру! Дозволяете отправить отряд на поиски?"

languages.text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"
languages.original_text: "П-прошу меня простить, офицеры разведки только что прислали обновленный отчет: мы перехватили сигнал бедствия с поверхности планеты! Велика вероятность, что передающая его портативная система радиовещания принадлежит пропавшему офицеру! Дозволяете отправить отряд на поиски?"

traits.locale_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There's a high likelihood that the portable transmitter that's sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

"M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There's a high likelihood that the portable transmitter that's sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

"M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

"M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

"M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

languages.text: “我——我很抱歉，但侦查军官刚刚发来了最新报告。我们截获了来自行星表面的求救信号！这个信号很可能是从失踪军官的便携式发信器中发出来的！请求批准派遣搜救队！”
languages.original_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

traits.locale_text: “我——我很抱歉，但侦查军官刚刚发来了最新报告。我们截获了来自行星表面的求救信号！这个信号很可能是从失踪军官的便携式发信器中发出来的！请求批准派遣搜救队！”

languages.text: «Lo... Lo lamento, pero los oficiales de reconocimiento han enviado un informe actualizado: ¡hemos interceptado una llamada de socorro desde la superficie! ¡Es muy probable que el transmisor de origen sea de la persona desaparecida! ¡Solicito permiso para enviar un equipo en su búsqueda!».
languages.original_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

traits.locale_text: «Lo... Lo lamento, pero los oficiales de reconocimiento han enviado un informe actualizado: ¡hemos interceptado una llamada de socorro desde la superficie! ¡Es muy probable que el transmisor de origen sea de la persona desaparecida! ¡Solicito permiso para enviar un equipo en su búsqueda!».

languages.text: "V-Verzeihung, aber die Aufklärungsoffiziere haben gerade einen neuen Bericht geschickt: Wir haben einen Notruf von der Planetenoberfläche abgefangen! Es besteht eine hohe Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass der tragbare Sender, der ihn sendet, dem vermissten Offizier gehört! Ich bitte um die Erlaubnis, einen Suchtrupp zu entsenden!"
languages.original_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

traits.locale_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

languages.text: « T-toutes mes excuses, mais les officiers en charge de la reconnaissance viennent de nous signaler l'interception d'un appel de détresse en provenance de la surface ! Il est plus que probable que le transmetteur portable à l'origine ce message appartient à l'officier disparu ! Je vous demande la permission d'envoyer une équipe de recherches ! »
languages.original_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

traits.locale_text: « T-toutes mes excuses, mais les officiers en charge de la reconnaissance viennent de nous signaler l'interception d'un appel de détresse en provenance de la surface ! Il est plus que probable que le transmetteur portable à l'origine ce message appartient à l'officier disparu ! Je vous demande la permission d'envoyer une équipe de recherches ! »

languages.text: 「も、申し訳ありませんが、偵察士官から最新の報告です。惑星の地表から救難信号を傍受しました！送信元の携帯型送信機は、行方不明の士官のものである可能性が高いです！捜索部隊を派遣する許可を求めています！」
languages.original_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"

traits.locale_text: 「も、申し訳ありませんが、偵察士官から最新の報告です。惑星の地表から救難信号を傍受しました！送信元の携帯型送信機は、行方不明の士官のものである可能性が高いです！捜索部隊を派遣する許可を求めています！」

languages.text: "Ö... Özürlerimi sunuyorum ama gözlem subayları, güncellenmiş bir rapor iletti: Gezegenin yüzeyinden bir yardım çağrısı aldık! Çağrıyı gönderenin kayıp subay olma ihtimali hayli yüksek! Bir arama ekibi göndermek için izninizi istiyorum!"
languages.original_text: "M-my apologies, but the recon officers have just delivered an updated report: we have intercepted a distress call from the planet's surface! There is a high probability that the portable transmitter sending it belongs to the missing officer! Requesting permission to dispatch a search party!"
